metadata.title: CVE-2016-8686 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The bm_new function in bitmap.h in potrace 1.13 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted image, which triggers a memory allocation failure.

notes.note: tyhicks> inkscape in xenial and earlier embeds libpotrace (LP: #1156664) mdeslaur> potrace in inkscape works on bitmaps already loaded, not arbitrary images. Marking as not-affected for inkscape.

criterions.comment: potrace package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14-2').
